Class ApiariesFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.davidmiguel.gobees.apiaries.ApiariesFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, ApiariesAdapter.ApiaryItemListener, ApiariesContract.View, BaseView<ApiariesContract.LoadDataPresenter>

    public class ApiariesFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements ApiariesContract.View, ApiariesAdapter.ApiaryItemListener
    Display a list of apiaries.
